snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg has become increasingly critical of the Wall Street protests, even while repeatedly defending the right of people to demonstrate.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg has become increasingly critical of the Wall Street protests, even while repeatedly defending the right of people to demonstrate.

headline.main: For Mayor, ‘Occupy Wall Street’ Evokes Protests From Vietnam Era
headline.print_headline: For Bloomberg, ‘Occupy Wall Street’ Evokes Protests From Vietnam Era
headline.seo: For Bloomberg, ‘Occupy Wall Street’ Evokes Vietnam-Era Protests
